it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Damageable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements Damageable
    This class represents the player entity, storing all info about its status during the match

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CompoundAction activeAction
      This property stores the action that the player is currently doing, null if it is not doing anything
      private Weapon activeWeapon
      This property stores the weapon the player is currently using
      private java.util.List<Ammo> ammos
      This property stores the ammos owned by the player
      private java.util.List<DamageToken> damageTokens
      This property represents the damage received by the player during its current life
      private static int[] FINAL_FRENZY_REWARD
      This property represents the reward achievable for killing the player in final frenzy mode
      private PlayerInfo info
      This property stores the basic player info
      private java.util.List<DamageToken> marks
      This property represents the marks received by the player during its current life

      This property stores the points earned by the player

      This property stores the powerups owned by the player

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(PlayerInfo info)
      This constructor creates a player from the basic info: the player will be empty and ready to start a new match
      Player(PlayerInfo info, java.util.List<DamageToken> damageTokens, java.util.List<DamageToken> marks, java.util.List<Weapon> weapons, int points, int skulls, java.util.List<Ammo> ammos, java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups, CompoundAction activeAction)
      This constructor creates a player given all info about its status: the player will be restored to an existing status and ready to continue a saved match

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(PlayerInfo info)
        This constructor creates a player from the basic info: the player will be empty and ready to start a new match
        Parameters:
        info - a PlayerInfo object containing the basic info

      • Player

        public Player(PlayerInfo info,
              java.util.List<DamageToken> damageTokens,
              java.util.List<DamageToken> marks,
              java.util.List<Weapon> weapons,
              int points,
              int skulls,
              java.util.List<Ammo> ammos,
              java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups,
              CompoundAction activeAction)
        This constructor creates a player given all info about its status: the player will be restored to an existing status and ready to continue a saved match
        Parameters:
        info - a PlayerInfo object containing the basic info
        damageTokens - a list containing the damage of the player
        marks - a list containing the marks of the player
        weapons - a list containing the weapons owned by the player
        points - an int representing the points scored by the player so far
        skulls - an int representing the skulls owned by the player
        ammos - a list containing the ammos owned by the player
        powerups - a list containing the powerups owned by the player
        activeAction - the action the player is currently doing

      • getDamageTokens

        public java.util.List<DamageToken> getDamageTokens()
        This method returns the damage tokens received so far by this Damageable
        Specified by:
        getDamageTokens in interface Damageable
        Returns:
        a list containing the DamageToken received so far, the list will be empty if there are none

        Parameters:

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon(Weapon weapon,
                       java.util.List<Ammo> ammos,
                       java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups,
                       Weapon discardedWeapon)
        This method allows the player to buy a new weapon
        Parameters:
        weapon - the Weapon that the player is buying
        ammos - the cost the player is paying with ammos
        powerups - the cost the player is paying with powerups
        discardedWeapon - the Weapon the player is giving up for the new one, if it already has the maximum number allowed

      • grabPowerup

        public void grabPowerup(PowerupTile powerup)
        This method allows the player to grab a new powerup
        Parameters:
        powerup - the Powerup the player is grabbing

      • reload

        public void reload(Weapon weapon,
                   java.util.List<Ammo> ammos,
                   java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups)
        This method allows the player to reload a weapon it owns
        Parameters:
        weapon - the Weapon that shall be reloaded
        ammos - the cost the player is paying with ammos
        powerups - the cost the player is paying with powerups

      • shoot

        public void shoot(Weapon weapon,
                  java.util.List<Ammo> ammos,
                  java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups)
        This method allows the player to use a weapon to shoot
        Parameters:
        weapon - the Weapon the player wants to use
        ammos - the cost the player is paying with ammos
        powerups - the cost the player is paying with powerups
